meta.videoTitle: Science-Supported Tools to Accelerate Your Fitness Goals

title_zh: 工具4：锻炼“零食”; 心血管和肌肉耐力

paragraphList.text_en: The Sugarcane exercise protocol is a valuable tool that can significantly enhance cardiovascular fitness with a minimal time commitment. This exercise regimen, named after trainer Kenny Kane, incorporates high-intensity interval training to improve cardiovascular output efficiently. The Sugarcane protocol involves high-intensity exercise performed over three rounds with rest periods in between. The exercise can vary from running to cycling, rowing, or other activities, as long as they can be done safely at high intensity.
paragraphList.text_zh: 甘蔗运动协议是一种有价值的工具，可以在较少的时间投入下显著提高心血管健康。这一运动方案以教练Kenny Kane命名，结合了高强度间歇训练，有效提高心血管输出。甘蔗协议包括在三轮之间进行休息的高强度运动。这种运动可以是跑步、骑车、划船或其他活动，只要能够安全地高强度地进行。

paragraphList.text_en: The structure of the Sugarcane exercise regimen is straightforward. After a brief warm-up, consisting of 3 to 5 minutes of jogging or similar activities to raise core body temperature, participants engage in three rounds of high-intensity work. In round 1, individuals aim to cover the maximum distance possible in 2 minutes, be it running, cycling, or another chosen activity. The distance achieved is noted down for reference. A 2-minute rest period follows before moving on to round 2, where the goal is to cover the previously marked distance as fast as possible, irrespective of the time taken.
paragraphList.text_zh: 甘蔗运动计划的结构很简单。在简短的热身运动之后，参与者进行三轮高强度训练。在第一轮中，个人的目标是在2分钟内以跑步、骑车或其他选择的运动方式尽可能覆盖最大距离。达到的距离会被记录下来作为参考。然后是2分钟的休息时间，然后进行第二轮，目标是尽快地覆盖之前标记的距离，无论所用时间多长。

paragraphList.text_en: Round 3 concludes the exercise, with participants going all out to cover the set distance within the time frame of round 2. The Sugarcane protocol encourages self-competition, pushing individuals to surpass their previous performances each round. After completing the three rounds, it is recommended to engage in a cooldown activity to gradually lower heart rate and aid in recovery.
paragraphList.text_zh: 第3轮结束了这次锻炼，参与者们全力以赴，在第2轮的时间内完成一定距离。甘蔗协议鼓励自我竞争，推动个人在每一轮中超越他们以往的表现。完成三轮之后，建议进行冷却活动，逐渐降低心率，帮助恢复。

paragraphList.text_en: Implementing the Sugarcane exercise regimen intermittently, about once every two to four weeks, can bring about several benefits. By maintaining high intensity throughout the three rounds, the protocol effectively elevates heart rate, thereby enhancing VO2 max. This improvement in cardiovascular fitness is crucial for overall health and performance metrics. Furthermore, the protocol adds an element of challenge and competition, encouraging individuals to strive for personal bests and continue pushing their limits.
paragraphList.text_zh: 实施甘蔗锻炼计划间歇性地，大约每两到四周一次，可以带来一些好处。通过在三轮中保持高强度，该协议有效地提升了心率，从而增加了最大摄氧量（VO2 max）。心血管健康的改善对于整体健康和绩效指标至关重要。此外，该协议增加了挑战和竞争的元素，鼓励个人不断努力创造个人最佳成绩，并继续挑战自己的极限。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, the Sugarcane exercise protocol serves as a valuable tool to enhance cardiovascular fitness and muscular endurance with a limited time commitment. By incorporating high-intensity interval training in a structured format, individuals can elevate their heart rate, improve VO2 max, and challenge themselves to surpass previous performances. Utilizing this regimen periodically can lead to significant improvements in both health and performance outcomes.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总的来说，甘蔗锻炼方案是一种有价值的工具，可以在有限的时间内增强心血管健康和肌肉耐力。通过将高强度间歇训练纳入结构化格式，个体可以提高心率、改善最大摄氧量，并挑战自己超越以往的表现。定期使用这种锻炼方法可以在健康和运动表现方面带来显著的改善。
